item.title: [TSJ CTF 2022] javascript_vm, w4nn4cryp7 writeup
item.author: Author
item.description: This is another CTF that I get to play with the people at team Project Sekai. The challenges are nice and interesting, and here are my writeups for the 2 RE challenges that I’ve managed to solve. javascript_vm Given file chall.bin VM source Description There are two kinds of Javascript virtual machines. Those who understand Javascript (like node.js) and those who don’t (like … ?).

item.title: Flareon 6 - challenge 7 (Wopr) solving log
item.author: Author
item.description: So because of my laziness, this blog has beed collecting dust for almost a year now. And since I’m solving some Flareon challenges from the last years, I figure it would be a good time to post some write up. But I’m too lazy to write a proper writeup (and also there are so many writeups of those challs already), I’m just gonna post a log of the things I did solving the challenge so that I can look back at it later when I need to.
